article: egypt 's most prominent political opposition leader , whose defiance of president hosni mubarak won him a second-place finish in this nation 's presidential contest last month , says he is the target of an orchestrated campaign to discredit and marginalize him .
abstract: mubarak foe bravado gone feels smeared
